oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, ... [et al.]].
Hard board covers; binding in fragile condition; pages in fair condition, stained, copy imperfect: pp. 1-2, 325-444 and 651-652 (index) missing.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.

With: Aṇat:ākhāḍo / Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn ; Mûmaṇ:ćitavaraṇī [to mûnivar bhāî mānī] / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Mûmaṇ:ćitveṇī [to mûnivar bhāî moṭī] / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Braham:prakās / Pīr Shams ; Ginān:amrāpûrījo / Pīr Indra Imām ad-Dīn ; Man:samjāṇī / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Khaṭ:darasanjī:vel / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Khaṭ:nirījan / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Saloko:niñḍho / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Mûman:ćitāmanī / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Jaṇkār / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Garbīs / Pīr Shams ; Prābhātio / Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Hāsam Shāh, Pīr Sohodev, ... [et al.] ; Dûvā[sic]:mûkhīnī:kirīā / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Dhûā:mûkhīnī:tobhānćhe / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Gûr:bharamāno:dharolā / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Vīvāno:ginān:satgûrno:ḍhol / Pīr Satgur Nur, Pīr Gur Bharamājī.
